author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Trailer for Deer & Boy, a poetic cinematic platformer developed by Lifeline Games. A deep connection begins to form between a boy who's run away from home and a baby deer. Progress through their emotional journey across different locations and landscapes in Deer & Boy, launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#ign #gaming
title: Deer & Boy - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Walker, an online co-op horror game developed by Dadilip. Players will work together as a crew to hunt sinister monsters in a giant cargo transporter known as a Walker. Capture Abnormal Entities to earn cash, make use of traps, and do what needs to be done to ensure survival and protect the Walker. Walker is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Walker - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A fresh batch of PlayStation 6 rumors claim that the next Sony console will be a family of devices, including a handheld and an 'S' version of the console, similar to the Xbox Series S. The PS6 has not been announced, but Sony has teased they're working on the console. The PS6 handheld will reportedly be dockable and be cheaper than the upcoming ROG Xbox Ally X handheld (which does not yet have a price). In other news, Cyberpunk 2077's Switch 2 edition is selling well, and maybe unsurprisingly 75% of sales are of the game's physical release. The full base game and the Phantom Liberty DLC are included on the 64GB cartridge, unlike some Switch 2 game key carts that only provide a license for the game which still needs to be downloaded from the eShop. And finally, Elden Ring Nightreign's ultra-hard Deep of Night mode has an official release date of September 11.

#IGN #Gaming #PlayStation
title: PlayStation 6 Rumors Claim It's a Dockable Handheld - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Risk of Rain Returns trailer to see what to expect with the Version 1.1.0 update for the roguelike remake of the classic Risk of Rain, which includes improvements and optimizations tailored for the Steam Deck. Some features in this new update include an 'experimental' option that allows more than four players in multiplayer, a ping and emote system to improve communication during multiplayer, new content (which includes a new drone and more), and more. Risk of Rain Returns' Version 1.1.0 update is out now.

#ign #gaming
title: Risk of Rain Returns - Official Version 1.1.0 Update Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Robin Hood teaser trailer for the upcoming reimagined adventure drama series. Robin Hood stars Jack Patten as Rob, Lauren McQueen as Marian, Sean Bean as the Sheriff of Nottingham, Lydia Peckham as Priscilla of Nottingham, Steven Waddington as the Earl of Huntingdon and Connie Nielsen as Queen Eleanor of Aquitaine. The 10-episode series will launch with a special two-episode premiere on Sunday, November 2 at 9:00 PM ET/PT on MGM+ in the U.S. with episodes releasing weekly leading up to the season finale on Sunday, December 28. Additionally, the series will be available to MGM+ viewers in the UK, Italy, Germany, Spain, Latin America, Belgium, the Netherlands, and Luxembourg.

From Lionsgate Television, Robin Hood brings a modern energy to the classic tale of the roguish outlaw hero who stole from the rich and gave to the poor, and the epic love story between him and a courageous and daring Marian. 

Following the Norman invasion of England, Rob – a Saxon forester’s son –
title: Robin Hood - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Jack Patten, Sean Bean, Lauren McQueen

author: IGN
description:
Warning: This trailer has flashing lights.

Take a look at the Cinematic Animation Trailer for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, an arcade Sonic-themed racer developed by SEGA. The ultimate race is about to begin, featuring the biggest names in the Sonic universe and beyond. Get your engines ready with the latest Cinematic Animation for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, launching on September 25 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#ign #gaming
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Official Cinematic Animation Trailer (Warning: Flashing Lights)

author: IGN
description: Step into the world of Honkai: Nexus Anima in this latest video for the upcoming game and latest entry in the Honkai franchise from HoYoverse. The new Honkai: Nexus Anima video features in-game footage, showcasing the vibrant world, character customization options, gameplay, and adorable creatures. In Honkai: Nexus Anima, players embark on a creature-collecting adventure, forging lasting bonds with their Anima companions. Recruitment for Honkai: Nexus Anima's first closed beta, the Nexus Bond Test, is now open.
title: Honkai: Nexus Anima - Official In-Game Footage

author: IGN
description:
Will Borger revisited Helldivers 2 on Xbox Series X for this review update. It's also available on PlayStation 5 and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Helldivers 2 Review Update - Now on Xbox

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the twisted enemies and dangers you'll face in this new Wolfound trailer for the upcoming sci-fi WWII Metroidvania game. Wolfhound will be available on PC, Nintendo Switch, and PlayStation 5 (PS5). 
Infiltrate a mysterious Axis base in the Bermuda Triangle as one-man army Capt. Chuck “WOLFHOUND” Rossetti. Explore the deadly island and uncover the Nazi's twisted scientific pursuits while wreaking havoc on their forces and horrific creations in Wolfhound.

#ign #gaming
title: Wolfhound - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Game Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Yooka-Replaylee gets a new trailer showing gameplay, features, a Nintendo Switch 2 announcement, and a release date. Check out the latest Yooka-Replaylee trailer for the upcoming reimagined story of the open-world 3D platforming collectathon adventure starring Yooka and Laylee. Yooka-Replaylee will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.
Retelling the story of their very first adventure, the two treasure hunters, Yooka, the charming green chameleon, and his fluffy little bat companion Laylee, take on the corporate creep Capital B, who is attempting to change the course of the universe by stealing all the Pagies to the One Book.

#ign #gaming
title: Yooka-Replaylee - Official Release Date Trailer | The MIX Fall Game Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the gameplay trailer for The Gold River Project, an upcoming single or multiplayer open-world camping adventure game where you and your friends are offered a remote camping trip. One week turns into several as you suspect your guide is never coming back. Deserted, you discover you are trapped in an experiment to see if you can survive. The Gold River Project will be available on PC, and a demo is out now on Steam.

#ign #gaming
title: The Gold River Project - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Game Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
The Dread returns. Check out the DreadOut 3 trailer for the upcoming third-person horror adventure inspired by Asian - Indonesian urban legend. The new DreadOut 3 trailer shows creepy locations, gameplay, and some of the horrors you'll encounter. DreadOut 3 will be available on PC.


Linda Meillinda returns to take on the unknown and seek out restless spirits. Follow Linda, as Keeper of the Dark, down an interdimensional rabbit hole to find the source of a dark, unseen power threatening the balance of light and darkness. This installment in the series expands on the lore of the previous games. Tread the line between the worlds of the living and the dead, and with the help of your trusty Iris Phone, uncover ghosts, demons, and gruesome horrors lurking in the shadows.

#ign #gaming
title: DreadOut 3 - Official Trailer | The MIX Fall Game Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Soldier Teaser Trailer for Tron: Ares, a sci-fi drama action film distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. Take a look at the next generation of soldiers in Tron: Ares, releasing in theaters on October 10.

A highly sophisticated Program, Ares, is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission.

Tron: Ares stars Greta Lee, Sarah Desjardins, Gillian Anderson, Jared Leto, Evan Peters, Jeff Bridges, Cameron Monaghan, Jodie Turner-Smith, and more. The film is written by Jesse Wigutow, Jack Thorne, and Steven Lisberger with Joachim Rønning directing Tron: Ares.

Tron: Ares releases in theaters on October 10.

#IGN #Movies
title: Tron: Ares - Official Soldier Teaser Trailer (2025) Jared Leto, Greta Lee, Jeff Bridges

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Accolades Trailer for Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, a third-person action soulslike RPG developed by Leenzee Games. Players will fight back against a deadly virus spreading across a town, turning the public into demonic creatures. Engage in deep, methodical combat and larger-than-life boss fights in Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GeForce Now).

#ign #gaming
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Kick off Lost Soul Aside with a look at its opening moments, captured in Performance Pro Mode on PlayStation 5 Pro. The gameplay introduces you to Kaser, Louisa, Zana, and more as they hatch a plan to climb high above the city to set off fireworks. Along the way, you’ll get a taste of some light platforming and, of course, a showcase of the game’s signature, over-the-top combat.

If you’re only interested in seeing actual combat gameplay, use the YouTube chapters to skip around to parts you might be interested in!

#ign #gaming #lostsoulaside 

00:00 Opening
01:08 Combat 1
01:58 Combat 2
06:43 Combat 3
16:29 Platforming Gameplay
19:36 Combat 4
21:05 Combat 5
title: Lost Soul Aside: First 26 Minutes of PS5 Pro Gameplay | 4K 60fps

description:
Of all the optional equipment you can find in Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, the Thermal Goggles are among the most important. They help with finding food, fighting bosses, and just generally make your life much easier. Here's everywhere you can find the Thermal Goggles in Metal Gear Solid Delta.

Timecodes

0:31 - Virtuous Mission Location
0:44 - Rassvet (First Location)

1:57 - Groznyj Grad Weapons Lab, East Wing (Third Location)

#IGN #MetalGearSolidDelta #MGS
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta - Where to Find the Thermal Goggles (All Locations)

title: Genshin Impact - Official Version Luna I: A Dance of Snowy Tides and Hoarfrost Groves Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Meet the characters and learn about the story of Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian in this new trailer for the upcoming RPG. Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and Windows PC via Steam on September 26, 2025.

In Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian, players follow Rias Eidreise and Slade Clauslyter as they explore mysterious ruins near their hometown, Hallfein. Upon discovering these ruins, Slade’s Geist Core reacts, opening a passage to an alchemist’s atelier filled with secrets that the two protagonists will attempt to unravel. After discovering that the power of Slade’s Geist Core can open gateways to new dimensions, known as the Dimensional Paths, Rias and Slade find a pedestal with strange text written in an unknown language that must be deciphered in order to uncover the secrets of the atelier and restore Hallfein.

#IGN #Atelier #KoeiTecmo
title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist & the White Guardian - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
See a ton of gameplay footage from God Save Birmingham as Creative Director Hyeonseong Cha gives you an update on what the development team has been doing since early gameplay trailers for the medieval zombie survival game blew up online. 

Wishlist God Save Birmingham on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3073940/God_Save_Birmingham/

#IGN #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
It’s finally time to step back into the shoes of Joe Mushashi for the first Shinobi game in 15 years – Shinobi: Art of Vengeance. 

From developer LizardCube, Shinobi: Art of Vengeance sees SEGA bring this 38 year old franchise back for a new hack-and-slash adventure that blends the classic arcade side-scrolling action with a new 2D hand-drawn art style. 

Whether you’ve been patiently waiting for this new entry or you’re a total newcomer, here’s why you should check out Shinobi: Art of Vengeance. Sponsored by SEGA.

#IGN #Shinobi #Sega
title: Why You Should Check Out Shinobi: Art of Vengeance

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the 'Judgement Day' Trailer for Terminator 2D: No Fate, an upcoming retro pixel-based 2D action game developed by Bitmap Bureau Ltd. Players can remember the fateful day of Judgement Day on August 29, 1997, when the world changed forever in the flames of chaos. Relive the events of Judgement Day in Terminator 2D: No Fate, launching on October 31 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Terminator 2D: No Fate - Official 'Judgement Day' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Street Fighter 6 x Monster Hunter Wilds trailer to see what's coming to this collaboration event between the fighting game and the action RPG. 

The Street Fighter 6 x Monster Hunter Wilds event features special collaboration items for players who log into Street Fighter 6 during the event period. The Shop will also have special EX colors for Blanka, Akuma, Manon, Cammy, and Ken inspired by some wild creatures. 

During the event, the Battle Hub gets a new makeover and a special Street Voter event, and the Monster Hunter 20th Anniversary Fighting Pass will return for the collaboration. The Street Fighter 6 x Monster Hunter Wilds limited-time event runs from September 1 through September 30, 2025.

#IGN #StreetFighter #MonsterHunter
title: Street Fighter 6 x Monster Hunter Wilds - Official Collab Event Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: What a thrill! Metal Gear Solid Delta is almost here, and it sure is a remake of Snake eater that plays and looks as well as the original, in some cases even better, though anyone hoping for more ambitious attempts to modernize Hideo Kojima’s PS2-era classic might be letdown, as it colors very much inside the lines. We’re excited to revisit this beloved game, and feeling hopeful that this means a return to form for the series - perhaps even new Metal Gear games someday?
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta Plays It Safer Than RE4 Remake, Here’s Why That Makes Sense - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Goosebumps: Terror in Little Creek, a stealth adventure game developed by PHL Collective. Players will embark on an adventure straight from the pages of R.L. Stine’s legendary books to take on an eerie mystery in Little Creek. Go face-to-face with sinister monsters, solve puzzles, and uncover a mystery to reveal the truth of it all. Goosebumps: Terror in Little Creek is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Goosebumps: Terror in Little Creek - Official Launch Trailer

description: Take a look at the Tom and Jerry Crossover Gameplay Trailer for Acecraft, a mobile action shoot 'em up aerial combat developed by Skystone Games. Players can enjoy a new collaboration with Tom and Jerry in the flying seat with specific planes suited for each of them, alongside a boss fight featuring Spike. Enjoy the limited-time Tom and Jerry Crossover in Acecraft, available now for iOS and Android.
title: Acecraft x  Tom and Jerry - Official Crossover Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Lucasfilm dropped the first official image from the set of the latest Star Wars movie, Starfighter. There's not much going on in the black-and-white photo—just star Ryan Gosling and costar FLynn Gray hanging out on what looks like a landspeeder—as production has only recently gotten underway. It's directed by Deadpool & Wolverine's Shawn Levy, and will be out in 2027. In other news, Crystal Dynamics has let go of an unknown number of workers following the cancelation of Perfect Dark. The game was in development hell for years, but showed signs of life last year with a new gameplay video, until Microsoft ultimately decided to pull the plug. And finally, PlayStation Plus is getting an Xbox game, with Psychonauts 2 leading the pack of new games coming to the service. The game was developed by Microsoft-owned Doublefine Studios.

#ign
title: First Official Look at Star Wars: Starfighter Starring Ryan Gosling - IGN Daily Fix
